page.title: 14SCHOOL IN HALBERTON (2)
page.content: {Shapland Middle School}in Tiverton three miles away from Halberton.They go there because there isn't another school in Halberton village.They start at Halberton first school when they are five years old and finish in their ninth year. In the school the children haven't got a canteen so they have a set meal. In Halberton School they haven't got a video or a computer or a proper room for a library but they have got some books to use.They hire a video from somebody.They occasionally have a barbecue and a fete all in one.They have an exhibition when they do good work on a project.When it is ready they ask parents to come and look around.
